snippet.title: Hearts of Iron IV: Death or Dishonor Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Death or Dishonor is a new Country Pack for Hearts of Iron IV, and expands upon players’ ability to experience history’s greatest conflict from any point of view. http://pdxint.at/2q7wkGd

This new pack focuses on the countries caught between the Soviet Union and Nazi Germany during World War II -- faced with the tough choices of starting a conflict with a global superpower, or compromising their ideals to strike a deal for their own survival.
